itemDisplayName: Deploy a 15-Node, cross Availability Zone, secure Service Fabric Cluster on Azure
description: This template allows you to deploy a 15-Node, cross AZ Service Fabric Cluster running Windows Server 2016 Datacenter with containers on 3 Standard_D2_V2 size VM ScaleSets, with network security groups enabled.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a 15-Node, cross Availability Zone Service Fabric Cluster
